doc.title: Size of Society
doc.plot: Several stories cross paths involving characters that all have an issue with size, a 12 year-old boy struggling with his height and contemplating suicide by cop while talking with his half-animated super hero imaginary friend, a retired police sergeant struggles with dementia while living with his abnormally-tall son, a real estate tycoon makes a deal on the black market to save his dying 6 year-old daughter from kidney failure, an ex-con working as a chauffeur deals with abandoning his mother in her best interest and an overweight woman deals with her obsession with becoming thin by spending most of her day on a treadmill.
